{"step_by_step_thinking": "The serial technique or telescoping technique is a method used in endodontics, specifically in root canal treatment. This technique is also known as the crown down technique because it involves preparing the coronal part of the canal before the apical part. The other options, such as the step back technique, standardize technique, and balance force technique, are different methods used in endodontics, but they are not synonymous with the serial or telescoping technique.", "answer_choice": "B. Crown down technique."}
